results.title: Novel drugs in familial combined hyperlipidemia: lessons from type 2 diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: Given these new findings, it can be anticipated that @<m>DISEASE_Hyperlipidemia_Familial_Combined</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006950 @@@FCHL@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ could also benefit from @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@-sensitizing therapy such as @CHEMICAL_Pioglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077205 @@@pioglitazone@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Brouwers MC, de Graaf J, van Greevenbroek MM, Schaper N, Stehouwer CD, Stalenhoef AF. Novel drugs in familial combined hyperlipidemia: lessons from type 2 diabetes mellitus. Curr Opin Lipidol. 2010 Dec;21(6):530-8. PMID: 20739883
